Summary: Ufo seen going at a fast speed. Blinking/Changing colors, lit-up like a light bulb and kept going.
divs: Sighting DetailsUfo seen going at a much faster speed than any conventional aircraft. The object was far away, looked like a small ball of light. When first noticed it was blinking red and white lights. All of sudden it was like somebody turned on the lights. The object looked like a ball of light and kept going at the same speed as before. It vanished into the clouds and out of sight.
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There was one other sighting in St Louis on or around October 1st 2009
